body.name: Xega 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera Solar [2 Pack] with SIM Card (Verizon AT&T T-Mobile),Wireless Outdoor No WiFi Security Camera,2K HD PTZ Night Vision Motion Detection 2 Way Talk SD&Cloud Storage
features: 📸🔋【𝟐 𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐊 𝟒𝐆 𝐋𝐓𝐄 𝐂𝐄𝐋𝐋𝐔𝐋𝐀𝐑 𝐒𝐄𝐂𝐔𝐑𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐂𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑𝐀 𝐒𝐎𝐋𝐀𝐑】No wifi and electrical power needed. Can be worked anywhere nationwide with 4G LTE coverage. Wire-free, ideal for outdoor places that is off-grid or no Wi-Fi, such as farms, construction sites, vacations homes, warehouse, etc. Comes with a prepaid EIOTCLUB Sim card with 300 MB free data for test. Requires Monthly Data Plan for 4G Cellular Coverage. Supports Data plan from Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile.

📸🔋【𝐒𝐎𝐋𝐀𝐑 & 𝐇𝐈𝐆𝐇-𝐂𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐈𝐓𝐘 𝐁𝐀𝐓𝐓𝐄𝐑𝐘 𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐄𝐃】5W High Efficiency Solar Panel, built-in 9000mAh rechargeable battery, this No Wifi Security Camera can work independently regardless of a sudden poweroff. Combined energy supply from solar panel and built-in batterie, No need to dismount the camera for recharging or worry about the weather. With about 3 hours of direct sunlight, the Panel can provide this 4g lte security camera with enough power to run for a whole day.

📸🔋【𝟐𝐊/𝟑𝐌𝐏 𝐒𝐔𝐏𝐄𝐑 𝐇𝐃 & 𝐂𝐎𝐕𝐄𝐑 𝐄𝐕𝐄𝐑𝐘 𝐂𝐎𝐑𝐍𝐄𝐑】Xega 4G Outdoor Wireless Solar Powered Camera captures each moment in 2K HD resolution, providing you with a clear footage. This 4G LTE Security Camera Outdoor can rotate 355°horizontally and 90°vertically, pan and tilt (Not supports automatic tracking of moving objects). You can remotely control the pan-tilt feature and 4X digital Zoom (Not optical zoom) via the Ubox App, always keep a watchful eye on your property.

📸🔋【𝐇𝐃 𝐂𝐎𝐋𝐎𝐑 𝐍𝐈𝐆𝐇𝐓 𝐕𝐈𝐒𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐓𝐖𝐎-𝐖𝐀𝐘 𝐀𝐔𝐃𝐈𝐎】This lte security camera outdoor has 4 built-in upgraded infrared LEDs, for use even in complete darkness. This 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera also provide you with super colorful, HD images, capturing all the details of your property. Equipped with a microphone and speaker, meaning you can communicate with others in front of the 4G Solar Security Camera Outdoor when necessary.

📸🔋【𝐖𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐎𝐅 & 𝐈𝐍𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐓 𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐈𝐅𝐈𝐂𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍】IP66 weatherproof ensures the usage no matter in sunny, rainy or snowy day. Once movement detected, Instant Alert can be sent to notify you in time with the "UBox" App. Never miss any activity around your property. Military-level Cloud Storage available. Worry-free about the risk of data leakage if camera is stolen or destroyed. 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐲-𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐖𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐲 backed by Professional Customer Service.

productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 59 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: Security for Farms, Barns, Contruction sites, Warehouse, Ranches, Plantations, Countryside, Breeding farms or places that is off-grid or out range of wifi See more

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Built In Light, PTZ Technology, Motion Sensor

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XEGA 4G Solar Cellular Security Camera Outdoor Requires Data Plan for 4G Cellular Coverage. Not Supports WiFi Connection/ Auto tracking of moving objets. Suitable for farms, docks, barns, jobsite, ranches, fields or places without electricity or wifi.

Previous page No Charging Worries Comes with 5W Solar Panel and 9000 mAh Rechargeable Battery, Providing Continous Power. No Wiring Hassles No Electric Or Network Cable Required. More Installation Positions Available. IP66 Weatherproof Ip66 Allows The Usage No Matter In Sunny, Rainy Or Snowy Day. High-Quality Speaker And Microphone You Can Easily Talk To Others In Front Of Th 4G Camera When Necessary. Cover a Larger Surveillance Area 355° Pan And 90° Tilt, Allowing More Perspectives. Color and Infrared Night Vision For Your Choice. Next page 1 Continuous Power Supply 2 Wireless Installation 3 Weatherproof 4 Two-way Voice & Siren 5 355° Pan and 90° Tilt

Xega 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera 1). Available for US. Not compatible for Other countries. 2). Supports Verizon, AT&T or T-Mobile. If you can't connect to 4G network with your own SIM card, please use your phone to Clear the PIN code of SIM card firstly; Turn on the Data Roaming of SIM card；Press and hold the Reset button to Reset the Camera. 3). Verizon has been successfully tested by engineers as well as customers. If skeptical, you can test it firstly with your existing Verizon Sim card and buy a new Verizon Sim card later.

2K HD Video. Protected Day and Night If you fail to connect to the 4G network, please: 1). Check whether the data is sufficient so that the indicator light is always blue; 2). Try to Reset the Camera and use APN connection; 3). Reach out to the XEGA Support Team via Amazon or Ubox App. XEGA XG-02 4G Lte Cellular Security Camera Uboxing Test 2 Pack 4g Lte Cellular Security Camera Solar； Solar & High-Capacity Battery Powered； 2k/3mp Super HD & HD Color Night Vision ； Instant Notifications & Friendly Technical Services.

Compatible Carriers Verizon, AT&T or T-Mobile. The 4g camera solar comes with EIOTClub data SIM card with 300MB free data for Test (The smallest Nano SIM). After running up, please top it up on UBox app or insert another compatible SIM card. If the camera goes offline, please firstly check if the data is running out. Micro SD Card and Cloud storage This 4G camera solar supports Micro SD Card storage (max. 128 GB, NOT included). Optional Cloud storage service(30-day free trial) can upload all events to the encryption cloud server, you can playback the cloud recordings from the phone App UBox easily even if the camera is damaged or stolen.

Application Only compatible with the "UBox" App. Field of View Horizontal: 355°; Vertical: 90° Operating Temperature -10°C to 60° (-14°F to 140°F) Charging Voltage 5V/2A USB power adaptor. It is recommended to fully charge the 4G Solar Security Camera before the first installation. Video 2K HD. Live view. Color and Infrared Night Vision. Motion Detection Up to 33ft (10m) range. Better be installed 8.2-9.8ft (2.5-3m) from the ground for a better view and motion alarm trigger. Manual Rotation The 4G Cellular Security Camera cannot auto tracking moving objects, but it can pan tilt 355° horizontally and 90° vertically via the Ubox App. Power Supply 5W Solar Panel with 9000mAh Capacity Battery. Supports Motion-triggered recording but NOT 24/7 uninterrupted recording. Connectivity Only works with 3g/4g LTE cellular connection. Not WiFi Connection. Each camera needs its own data plan if you have more than one camera. Alarm Motion detection up to 10m (33ft). Send notifications via Ubox app (Activation status). Optional siren alarm. SIM/Micro SD Card Insertion Insert it according to the SIM card and Micro SD card icons on the Camera. Please make sure it is fully inserted. If you want to remove it, just push it in again. 4G Frequency Bands LTE-FDD：B2/B4/B5/B12/B13/B25/B26 Tips: 1). Support Micro SD card and Cloud storage instead of RTSP/ONVIF/NVR/FTP. 2).Supports Android/iOS devices instead of PC and NVR. Package List 2* 4G Cellular Security Camera; 2* 5W Solar Panel; 2* 300M Nano SIM Card FOR TRIAL (Pre-inserted); 2* Bracket for Solar Panel; 2* 3m Connection Cable; & 2* 1m USB Charging Cable; 2* Instructions; 2* Position Paper

How to set up this 4g lte cellular security camera? 1) Download Ubox APP from Google Play or APP Store. 2) Insert the Nano-SIM card into the correct slot. 3) Power on the camera and Reset the camera, wait for the led indicator turns blue. 4) Use UBox App to scan the QR code on the base of the camera. What countries is the US Version of this 4g lte security camera available for? This 4G Security Camera is a US version that is suitable to use in the the United States. Not compatible for Other countries. If you want to confirm whether a certain SIM card is compatible, please feel free to text us. How much data will this Xega 4G security camera outdoor use monthly? Depends on the actual working conditions. Normally, 1-2GB will be enough monthly. DATA PACKAGE with pre-inserted EiotClub SIM card: about＄14.9/3GB/30-day. You can also choose to insert another compatible sim card. Other details about SIM cards for this 4g camera solar? SIM Card Format: Nano SIM (included), 0.48 x 0.35 x 0.026 inch; If your SIM card cannot be recognized by your camera, please press and hold the Reset button to reset the camera; Note: An SIM card was already pre-inserted in the 4G camera in advance. Camera is pretty good, but it goes offline suddenly, what can I do? 1. Check the your data balance. Top it up then restart it manually or wait for 1 hour to restart automatically. 2. Check whether your device is out of battery. 3. Please contact our Support through Ubox app, and we will reply to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Purchase/Outstanding Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: We purchased these cameras during the build of our home. The quality of the camera is wonderful but the customer service that comes with the camera is even better! In total, we purchased 3 cameras and when a small issue arose with one of the cameras, Joey was quick to find a solution providing the best in customer service. He went above and beyond to ensure we were satisfied and that camera usage continued with ease. I would recommend this product…10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value & great customer service
reviews.reviewText: We ordered these cameras to keep an eye on our remote building site. We use like that they had a SIM card that could be used with the carrier that would best work in the area. It alerted us when there was activity & we could check or zoom in to see what was going on. One camera did stop working after a few months. I sent message to customer service & received help within a day. After a few attempts, determined that camera was faulty but they sent a new one within a few days. Very happy with the results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to set up, does not work.
reviews.reviewText: This was a two pack of cameras. Neither camera seems to work. Directions say signal indicator is red on charge, turns blue after charge. Signal indicator does not light up with multiple different chargers tried and also the solar chargers that came with cameras do not light it up either. The direction sheet show a charge indicator by the charge port but it does not light up either if there is one.Directions say to install TF card but there were not any TF cards in the box with the cameras.Camera is unable to connect with phone, Android.Directions are confusing and unclear or the cameras just don't work.The video for setting up camera is horrible, shows inserting the Sim card and TF card, ok where do you get the TF card from and is it required to set up the camera?Is the signal indicator actually the charge indicator or is the charge indicator by the charge port? In any case nothing lights up on either camera when charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. I reached out to customer service with some concerns and Kiki was very helpful and answered all of our questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Had one camera that wasn’t performing very well. Reached out to customer service and Kiki has been great. Sent me a replacement and has checked in routinely to make sure I was satisfied. Also, the cameras helped me catch my problem I was having by alerting me at 3am that someone was on my property.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were very easy to install, the appearance of these cameras are amazing, great Quality for such an affordable price. The images on my phone is definitely outstanding and not what I was expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not what I was looking for to do the job I need
reviews.reviewText: Could not get the system to work as expected and the picture quality was not there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price & amazing customer service
reviews.reviewText: Camera works really well & Kiki in customer service is amazingly helpful!

Me gusta mucho esta cámara os la recomiendo , el poder ver todo cuando quieras, tuve un problema porque no sabía quitar la alarma automática y contacte con el servicio al cliente y me facilitaron todo para hacerlo gracias a Kiki pudimos configurar todo lo que no sabía, si tengo alguna duda más no dudaré en volver a contactar con ellos .
Einfach zu installieren, einfach mit der App zu verbinden, gute Bilder und gute Steuerung und die Solar-Panele scheinen gut und ausreichend gross bemessen zu sein.
Très déçu, connexion 4G aléatoire, une des caméra ne fonction plus; elle ne détecte plus la carte sim. Pas de retour de garanti possible car livré il y a plus d'un mois.

Unlike the previous model with the solar panel on the top of the dome that one disapointed me!Very often goes "offline" despite the perfect 4g signal present in the area of installation.Also a solar panel is unable to kept sufficient charge level of the battery and often battery getting completely drained.Better buy a previous model which is excellent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great system, and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I bought the double set of cameras and set them up with solar panels, one then stopped working with the night vision for no reason. I contacted the customer service through the system app which was really easy to use and the person who helped me, Joey, was exceptionally good and efficient not only at answering my queries but with rectifying the problem and sorting a replacement unit in under 3 days. Really happy across the board!
